item.title: Andrie de Vries
item.description:
Andrie de Vries is a data scientist, author and R programmer. Andrie is co-author of the book R for dummies, the book that helps everyone getting started with R, regardless of prior programming knowledge. He is also a regular contributor to the question and answer site StackOverflow.
He is also a regular speaker at R and industry events, including: 2017 UseR!2017: Can you keep a secret?. You can watch a video recording of this session.
